<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the space usage statistics"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/statistics/spaceusage/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the space usage statistics of the module with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Module ID","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Module space usage statistics","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Item name"},"Icon":{"type":"string","example":"Item icon path"},"Disabled":{"type":"boolean","example":"false"},"Size":{"type":"string","example":"0 Byte"},"Url":{"type":"string","example":"Item url"}},"title":"UsageSpaceStatItemWrapper"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
